name: Lever Network
introduce: Lever is an AMM-based decentralized margin trading platform on multi-chains, where users can easily earn interest through lending and perform leveraged trading. Powered by its own margin pool and by integrating with external AMM’s like Uniswap, Lever can significantly increase trade efficiency and asset utilization. With Lever, simplified margin trading and visualized position management are available for traders in the DeFi space.
